name: Bear Hunting - Summer Season
description:
Hunting has never been so realistic with Bear Hunting 4 - Summer Season!
PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT:
3 professional weapons, 5 maps to choose from and sniper aiming
SMART PREY: dangerous animals to hunt
FREE EXPLORATION: and your own dog to hunt with
Feral Animals Hunting:

• Choose from the maps according to which animal you'd like to hunt down.
• Choose from the weapons available.
• Try to stay invisible to the prey.

HOW TO PLAY:
Choose from the maps according to which animal you'd like to hunt down.
Choose from the weapons available.

Characteristics:
- dangerous animals to hunt
- 3 professional weapons
- 5 maps to choose from
- sniper aiming
- your own dog to hunt with
- free exploration.
